import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Iproduct } from '../iproduct'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { ProductList: Iproduct[] =[]; constructor(){ this.ProductList =[ {id: 1, name: 'camera', description: 'anything', price: 500, onsale: false, discount: 5, quantity: 7, image: 'assets/images/camera.jpg'}, {id: 1, name: 'camera', description: 'anything', price: 500, onsale: false, discount: 5, quantity: 7, image: 'assets/images/camera.jpg'}, {id: 1, name: 'camera', description: 'anything', price: 500, onsale: false, discount: 5, quantity: 7, image: 'assets/images/camera.jpg'}, {id: 1, name: 'camera', description: 'anything', price: 500, onsale: false, discount: 5, quantity: 7, image: 'assets/images/camera.jpg'}, {id: 1, name: 'camera', description: 'anything', price: 500, onsale: false, discount: 5, quantity: 7, image: 'assets/images/camera.jpg'}, ] } }
